name: Boat Game (AlexDev21)
description:
Maybe in the future I'll make it from scratch and make it a full new complete game! This is prototype of the "4H3DGM" Jam. Enjoy!

"W", "A", "S", "D" For Navigate in the boat and under the water.

"Q" and "E" For Navigate under the water.

"F" To interact with the levers.
